<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Phistophilus (Contract Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2909)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Contract devils are clerks, scribes, and bureaucrats of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=42) rarely found outside the infernal courts, and then almost always to pursue potential contracts, tempting mortals to sell their souls in exchange for achieving their worldly desires. If a target is desirable enough, a phistophilus can offer contracts for prices seemingly lesser than their soul all at once, though in this case, the devil carefully manipulates the price to drive the signatory toward the forces of Hell anyway. Contract devils are tall creatures with skin tones that range from bronze to crimson and large curving horns extending from their bodies, over which they often drape favored or important contracts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Phistophilus.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Phistophilus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2909)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=575" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=600" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 90 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +21; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet, [_truespeech_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +25, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +23 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 150

</row>

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), ward contract

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 10

**Weaknesses**
[holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 10

**Ward Contract** A signed contract carried by a living contract devil (including draped over their horns) is immune to damage from all creatures other than that contract devil. A contract devil is immune to [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) effects that would make them destroy, nullify, or alter a contract.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
binding contract +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 3d6+11 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) and infernal wound

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horn +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d10+11 piercing plus infernal wound

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 31
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **3rd**
[Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will)
- **4th**
[Peaceful Bubble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1624), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will)
- **5th**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173) (at will), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) (at will), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724)
- **7th**
[Interplanar Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=1576)
- **10th**
[Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) (at will; see infernal investment)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Truespeech](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)

**Rituals** DC 31

- **1st**
[Diabolic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=143)

**Draft Contract** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The contract devil produces an infernal contract for a single living mortal. This contract can grant a wide range of abilities and effects, akin to the power of a [_wish_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=125) ritual but fulfilled to the letter by the contract devil. To receive any of those benefits, the mortal must willingly sign its true name to the contract. At that point, the mortal's soul is bound to the contract devil and [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=42).

 While the contract is in effect, the victim can't be restored to life except by _wish_ or similar magic. If the mortal is restored to life by those means, the contract devil knows which mortal came to life and can locate the creature or creatures who restored the mortal to life for 1 year, gaining the effects of a [_locate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1588) spell with unlimited range. Avoiding the terms of an infernal contract is difficult and often dangerous.

**Infernal Investment**   A contract devil can cast a 10th-rank innate [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1662) spell at will, but only to target a creature with which they have a contract. The target automatically critically fails its save.

**Infernal Wound**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) The wounds from a contract devil's Strikes resist healing. A spellcaster or item attempting to use [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623) magic on a creature suffering first attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) infernal wound (DC 29). If it is not counteracted, the healing has no effect.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Infernal Contracts</title>

The diabolic contracts created by contract devils are not the only ways a devil can engage a mortal in a binding agreement, but they are the most convenient. Other devils must perform complex rituals or jump through bureaucratic hoops to organize a contract with a mortal, and in most cases the easiest solution for devils in this situation is to simply enlist the aid of a contract devil
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-389" />
